title: Chris Bedowitz - Wall St. and Professional Poker to Software Engineer
description: In this episode of Second Career Devs, I chat with Chris Bedowitz about how long lasting passion for technology took him from Wall Street, to the poker table, and eventually into software development. A more seasoned career changer than most, Chris has lots of great advice to share for those who are considering making a change themselves.

links.text: Brian Holt's React Course on Frontend Masters
